channel.title: Blogdown on R, it's OK I guess
channel.description: Recent content in Blogdown on R, it's OK I guess

item.title: Name your code chunks!
item.description: Blogdown is amazing, but there is one thing that tripped me up, and I just worked out why. I have lots of graphs in my posts, but I was sometimes getting the wrong ones, and I was wondering why that was. I took a look in the Git pane in R Studio and discovered something. If you make a graph like this with an unnamed code chunk library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.
